definition: armpit/also pr. [ge1 zhi5 wo1]/also written 夾肢窩|夹肢窝[ga1 zhi5 wo1]

sentences.english: He tickled me and I laughed even harder.
sentences.chinese: 他開始胳肢我，我笑得更響了。

sentences.english: Please put this thermometer under your armpit and let me feel your pulse.
sentences.chinese: 將溫度計放在腋窩裏面，用胳肢窩夾住它。

sentences.english: The axilla is the medical term for the armpit.
sentences.chinese: 腋窩是“胳肢窩”的醫學術語。

sentences.english: Also tickle Arnie when he gets up and when he goes to bed all from me.
sentences.chinese: 此時，我不能在阿恩起牀或上牀睡覺時再去胳肢他了。

sentences.english: Do you know how to make arm farts ?
sentences.chinese: 你知道怎樣用胳肢窩放屁嗎？

sentences.english: Place the thermometer in the armpit with arms crossed over the chest.
sentences.chinese: 將溫度計放在腋窩裏面，用胳肢窩夾住它。

sentences.english: This is the hardest concept for most people to understand.
sentences.chinese: 這對多數人來說是最不能理解的，胳肢怎麼能傷人呢？

sentences.english: Today, I decided that the only way of getting my brother off the couch was to tickle him off.
sentences.chinese: 今天我哥賴在沙發上不起來，我決定胳肢他。

sentences.english: Then I once again began to tickle his balls, thighs and virgin hole.
sentences.chinese: 然後我再一次開始胳肢他的小丸劑，股和處女洞。

sentences.english: The other day I noticed him trying to tickle himself but he couldn't do it.
sentences.chinese: 還有一天我注意到他試圖胳肢他自己，但是他做不到。

sentences.english: I am so sensitive to touch that a tickle hurts me.
sentences.chinese: 我對觸覺太敏感了，以至於“胳肢”都能傷害到我。

sentences.english: "How old is your daddy?" I made fun of him and tickled him.
sentences.chinese: “你的爸爸幾歲啦？”我邊逗他邊胳肢他。

definition: armpit/also pr. [ge1 zhi5 wo1]/also written 夾肢窩|夹肢窝[ga1 zhi5 wo1]
to grimace (in pain)/to show one's teeth/to bare one's fangs
to stay/to stop/to tease (play with)/amusing/short pause in reading aloud, equivalent to comma (also written 讀|读[dou4])
to sway to and fro/to rock back and forth
